p.e:
Schraubhubers may
appear to be weak, but
they can be fatal if you
have a lot of them.
They're also as fast as
gearmovers, making it
a good supply unit.

Battle cages can give
you a tactical edge,
especially if you have
one or two builders
inside it to repair it
from time to time.

Do not forget about
the builder's "flag"
ability.
he can convert enemy
buildings if he is close
enough.
devastating if you can
get close to enemy
turrets!

Nopebots are designed
for heavy terrain, such
as mountains and cities
so make sure to use
them there!
